ratings.comment: I loved having Irene! She really helped me move to the next level with my Italian. She is so patient and willing to re-explain and do what it takes to help you understand. She also makes class fun and does what she can to mix up the classes so it's not monotonous and boring. One of my favorite Profs!

Easy but helpful class. You can tell Irene loves Italian and teaching. She is super understanding if you don't come to class, but always try to make it (participation counts for a huge part of your grade). Really sad she isn't teaching 102.

I had her for Italian 102, and she is by far my favorite Prof. so far. She is really good at explaining anything you don't understand, and her lectures overall are really great, involving pictures, speaking, conversations, etc. I struggled at the beginning of the semester, but caught on pretty quick!

Irene is one of the best instructors that I have had at UW-Madison. I had her for both 101 and 102. She presents every new concept in class very clearly. She is very understanding, accommodating, and caring. There is a fair amount of homework, but it is essential to the class. The quizzes, tests, and oral exams are not difficult if you study.

Irene was the perfect Italian professor. She is clearly fluent in Italian and has found the perfect way to teach first-time Italian speakers combining the perfect balance between lectures, conversational practice, and grammar/vocab activities. She is also such a fun professor and connects very easily with all students.

I think Irene is an absolutely amazing Italian teacher. She is so clear when teaching new concepts and creates a super welcoming environment for students to try out the language. There is quite a bit of homework, but most of it is quick, relevant, and helpful. She is so sweet and clearly wants her students to succeed!

Absolute favorite teacher I've had at Madison. Irene makes Italian super interesting and exciting to learn. She answers e-mails instantly, is usually very available, and honestly the most caring person. Tests are very straight forward and you have to do a lot of busy work, but that's normal for any foreign language. 100% take it with Irene.

Irene is such an amazing instructor. She is so kind, understanding, accommodating, and she genuinely wants her students to succeed. She is extremely knowledgable, and she always provides her students with as many materials and sources as she can to help them do well. She was my absolute favorite instructor of the semester!

Irene is terrific! She is literally the best instructor I have ever had! She gives thorough feedback, is accessible by email or office hours, and genuinely cares about her students. I am very thankful I had her for my class this semester as I struggle with learning foreign languages. She made it so fun, understandable, and simple! Highly recommend!

Loved Irene! She really cares that her students do well and is always there to help. Makes class fun and interesting and is always clear about what will be on the quiz/exam. There is a lot of homework sometimes, but that comes with all language classes. My Italian improved so much. Highly recommend her to anyone wanting to take Italian!
I love Irene! I would love to have her as a TA for italian again. She is very sweet and very helpful!
Excellent instructor... responds almost immediately to emails and is a very fair grader.  Knows her stuff and is very approachable.
Amazing teacher! Helpful, nice, and fun to talk to. Very fair grader as well. Highly recommend her!
